name: Micro Mayor
description:
Ludum Dare #38 jam game

THEME

You are the newly assigned mayor of a small section of city. Your predecessor left behind nothing but rubble and empty promises. It's your job to bring life back to your little mirco-city and finish the big project that was left behind. Don't forget your office's generous open door policy and motivated citizens.

A short one screen city builder. Played with mouse.
